title: HELP identifying lp artwork font!
content:
hi can anyone identify the fonts used in these pieces of artwork? thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203319im_/http:/typophile.com/files/filthydukes_4000.jpg)

 [‹ Font ID help.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203319/http:/typophile.com/node/50718 "Go to previous forum topic") [sephora logo font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203319/http:/typophile.com/node/50715 "Go to next forum topic")
author: simundo

comments.content:
Actually, the FILTHY DUKES looks like customized/modified/stencilized Futura Bold.  
So it’s all Futura.
